dcterms:creator: A. Arzt
G. Widmer
dcterms:description: A live performance recording of the opera 'Don Giovanni' by W.A. Mozart, conducted by Ádám Fischer, used as the target for tracking.
dcterms:title: Don Giovanni (live performance recording)

dcterms:creator: M. Prockup
D. Grunberg
A. Hrybyk
Y. E. Kim
dcterms:description: A CD recording of the opera 'Don Giovanni' by W.A. Mozart, conducted by Herbert von Karajan, used as a reference for tracking.
dcterms:title: Don Giovanni (CD recording by Herbert von Karajan)

dcterms:description: An internal dataset consisting of YouTube recordings of classical music performances, manually annotated with applause, music, and speech labels, used for training acoustic event detectors.
dcterms:title: Internal dataset of YouTube recordings of classical music performances
